entity.name: Trump's advice to Boeing reminds some of his defunct businesses
entity.description: President Trump weighed in on Boeing in the wake of its two deadly crashes in recent months, advising them to "FIX" and "REBRAND." POTUS' statement reminded some of his own stint with aviation, along with several other ventures, that are now defunct.

text: @realDonaldTrump Why should tax payers bail out Boeing their troubles started way before coronavirus with faulty plane making and inspection/certification
